nodes.text: Darlyn Boda was a planet in the Anoat sector of the Outer Rim Territories. During the Galactic Empire's Iron Blockade, Darlyn Boda had a criminal network which included the Trade Spine League and the Ivax Syndicate.

A black market dealer on the planet offered a selection of valuable materials as payment for anyone who would rough up a number of thugs and gang members who were driving away his clientele, and at another point during the blockade, one of the smaller gangs on Darlyn Boda attempted to discredit the Trade Spine League's integrity by spreading false rumors of their dealings. In response, a young smuggler assigned a crew member to stop them.
